bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a feeling of vexation developing into mental pressure. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gou 狗 quoting Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 單行白犬骨散，主產後煩悶不食方 , “Recipe of a powder of a single substance, the bones of white dogs, for postpartum vexation and heart-pressure and an unwillingness to eat”, writes: 產後煩懣不食者，白犬骨 燒研，水服方寸匕 , “In the case of postpartum vexation and mental pressure and an unwillingness to eat, roast and pulverize the bones of white dogs. Ingest 1square-inch spoon full, with water”.
